channel.title: Offline on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Offline on Arrans github.io

item.title: streamich/json-joy
item.description: json-joy is a library that implements cutting-edge real-time and collaborative editing algorithms and utilities for JSON data models, with a focus on developing the JSON CRDT (Conflict-free Replicated Data Type) specification and implementation.

item.title: alphacep/vosk-api
item.description: Offline speech recognition API for Android, iOS, Raspberry Pi and servers with Python, Java, C# and Node

item.title: XandAI-project/Xandai-CLI
item.description: Your offline AI coding assistant in the terminal using ollama and LM studio

item.title: OfflineIMAP/offlineimap
item.description: Read/sync your IMAP mailboxes (python2) [LEGACY: move to offlineimap3]
